general.name: specLite_coadd
general.short: spectral data for a given custom coadd, mjd, and catalogid
general.description: The spectral data for a given custom coadd, mjd, and catalogid including the coadded spectra, spAll metadata, Model fit metadata from spZall, and Line fitting metadadta from spZline

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

releases.name: DR19
releases.description: SDSS unreleased data.  Represents any work-in-progress data.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another
